pkgmetadata.longdescription: # text-to-speech[![npm](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/text-to-speech.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/text-to-speech/)This is a simple text to speech engine with some customizable options.## InstallationRun the following to install:```consolepip install text-to-speech```## Usage### Save```pythonsave()```Params:```Text: String ? The text to be read.Language: String ? The language (IETF language tag) to read the text in.Slow: Boolean ? Reads text more slowly.File: String ? The file to save the text to, default is = "speech.mp3", only accepts .mp3.Lang_check: Boolean ? If the text has to be checked on language errors.```Demo:```pythonfrom text_to_speech import savesave("Hello World", "en", file="Hello-World.mp3")```# License[MIT](https://github.com/dewittethomas/text-to-speech/blob/master/LICENSE)
